description: Wild regional produce, game and freshwater fish take pride of place on the menu at this elegant restaurant which celebrates nature in all its glory, despite its town-centre location. The dishes prepared by chef Federico Beretta have a contemporary feel, while the tasting menu is dedicated to wild ingredients foraged from the woods.
